languages.text: "Уверена, многие на корабле пожелали бы, чтобы их прибыли спасать с таким рвением. Но все лучшее должно доставаться Вольному Торговцу, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Уверена, многие на корабле пожелали бы, чтобы их прибыли спасать с таким рвением. Но все лучшее должно доставаться Вольному Торговцу, не так ли?"

languages.text: "I am sure many on this ship would be pleased to be rescued with such daring. But it is only right that the Rogue Trader should get all the nicest things, is it not?"
languages.original_text: "Уверена, многие на корабле пожелали бы, чтобы их прибыли спасать с таким рвением. Но все лучшее должно доставаться Вольному Торговцу, не так ли?"

"I am sure many on this ship would be pleased to be rescued with such daring. But it is only right that the Rogue Trader should get all the nicest things, is it not?"

languages.text: «Estoy segura de que muchos en esta nave estarían encantados de que les rescataran con semejante audacia. Pero es lógico que sea {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quien se lleve todo lo bueno, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "I am sure many on this ship would be pleased to be rescued with such daring. But it is only right that the Rogue Trader should get all the nicest things, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: «Estoy segura de que muchos en esta nave estarían encantados de que les rescataran con semejante audacia. Pero es lógico que sea {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quien se lleve todo lo bueno, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「この船の多くの者が、そのような大胆な方法で救助されることを喜ぶはずだ。しかし、自由開拓者がすべての素敵なものを手に入れるのは当然のことでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "I am sure many on this ship would be pleased to be rescued with such daring. But it is only right that the Rogue Trader should get all the nicest things, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: 「この船の多くの者が、そのような大胆な方法で救助されることを喜ぶはずだ。しかし、自由開拓者がすべての素敵なものを手に入れるのは当然のことでしょう？」

languages.text: “我相信，这艘船上很多人都希望得到像这样的应用救援。不过身为行商浪人，就是有权得到所有最好的东西，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "I am sure many on this ship would be pleased to be rescued with such daring. But it is only right that the Rogue Trader should get all the nicest things, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: “我相信，这艘船上很多人都希望得到像这样的应用救援。不过身为行商浪人，就是有权得到所有最好的东西，没错吧？”

languages.text: "Ich bin sicher, viele auf diesem Schiff würden sich freuen, mit einem solchen Wagemut gerettet zu werden. Aber es ist nur rechtens, dass sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Rosinen herauspickt, oder?"
languages.original_text: "I am sure many on this ship would be pleased to be rescued with such daring. But it is only right that the Rogue Trader should get all the nicest things, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin sicher, viele auf diesem Schiff würden sich freuen, mit einem solchen Wagemut gerettet zu werden. Aber es ist nur rechtens, dass sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Rosinen herauspickt, oder?"

languages.text: « Un sauvetage aussi audacieux ferait sans doute pâlir d'envie bon nombre d'occupants de ce vaisseau. Mais après tout, il est bien naturel que {mf|le libre-marchand seul|la libre-marchande seule} ait droit à tous les égards, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "I am sure many on this ship would be pleased to be rescued with such daring. But it is only right that the Rogue Trader should get all the nicest things, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: « Un sauvetage aussi audacieux ferait sans doute pâlir d'envie bon nombre d'occupants de ce vaisseau. Mais après tout, il est bien naturel que {mf|le libre-marchand seul|la libre-marchande seule} ait droit à tous les égards, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Gemideki pek çok kişinin böylesine cüretkâr bir şekilde kurtarılmaktan hoşnut olacağına eminim. Yine de en güzel şeyleri Hür Tacir'in alması yerinde olur, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "I am sure many on this ship would be pleased to be rescued with such daring. But it is only right that the Rogue Trader should get all the nicest things, is it not?"
